actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit more persons to immigrate from colonies of foreign states.

summary.text: Authorizes, under the Immigration and Nationality Act, the increased issuance of immigration visas to persons from colonies of foreign states under specified conditions of severe hardship to the families of such persons.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit more persons to immigrate from colonies of foreign states.
